# Common Transition Subtypes

**API Collection**

These constants specify the direction of motion-based transitions. They are used with the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransition/subtype] property.

## Constants

- **fromRight**: The transition begins at the right side of the layer.
- **fromLeft**: The transition begins at the left side of the layer.
- **fromTop**: The transition begins at the top of the layer.
- **fromBottom**: The transition begins at the bottom of the layer.

## Constants

- **Common Transition Types**: These constants specify the transition types that can be used with the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransition/type] property.

items.description: The transition begins at the right side of the layer.
items.name: fromRight

items.description: The transition begins at the left side of the layer.
items.name: fromLeft

items.description: The transition begins at the top of the layer.
items.name: fromTop

items.description: The transition begins at the bottom of the layer.
items.name: fromBottom
